name: Luugal Portal
text:
Whenever you summon, Luugal Portal deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
{r}{r}{r}{r}{r}: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any number of creature spells with mana value 3 or less among them without paying their mana cost. They gain haste until end of turn. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step. Exile the rest.
